name: OPENioting
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
OPEN.ioting skill and Alexa enables you to control your gate or garage door by voice. To utilize it with your Alexa smart home, you'll need the OPEN.ioting device manufactured by T.E.L.L. Software Hungária Kft. OPEN.ioting serves as a smart home remote control, equipped with both WiFi and ETH connections, and is specifically designed for electric gates and barriers.

- To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa app to link your OPEN.ioting account and discover your devices.
- To use the skill, you need established names for your devices. You can use OPEN.ioting mobile application to name your gates / garage doors

After you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:
"Alexa, open {name}"

For example if you name your device to garage, you can say:
"Alexa, open garage"
